items.title: Several killed after bus crashes into Stockholm bus stop
items.description: Several others have have been injured in the crash in the Swedish capital, police say.

items.title: Man jailed for drugging, raping and filming women
items.description: Multiple rapist Chao Xu is sentenced to life imprisonment with a minimum term of 14 years.

items.title: Mass killings probe in Sudan will hold culprits to account, vows UN
items.description: "There has been too much pretence and performance, and too little action," says UN human rights chief Volker TÃ¼rk.

items.title: McIlroy continues charge for Race to Dubai title
items.description: Rory McIlroy chases Denmark's Nicolai Hoejgaard in the second round of the DP World Tour Championship for his seventh Race to Dubai title.

items.title: TikTok star HSTikkyTokky handed suspended sentence
items.description: Harrison Sullivan said he was "ashamed" after crashing his McLaren before failing to attend court.
